name: Pinball 20 Seconds Rush
description:
FAST! You only have 20 seconds to get the highest score you can. I got up to 2800 points. I dare you to try to beat me. Good Luck!

Controls: Clic on the main Menu to sart.  When you are playing: x to sart, z for using the left stick and c for the right one,

Game made on Unreal Engine 5 by Alberto García Menéndez (Ato).

Assets from the sarter content
